name: Easy, Boneless Hot Wings
author: jwooten
summary: This is easy, fast, and really delicious! Depending on how hungry you are, this can serve more or less people. Good for a dorm!
directions: Pour hot sauce and butter into a large microwave-safe bowl
Microwave on High for 30 seconds, stir, then continue cooking until the butter has melted, about 30 seconds more
Stir sauce until blended, and set aside
Microwave chicken strips according to package directions on a microwave safe plate
Once cooked, toss chicken strips with butter mixture until completely coated
Replace chicken onto plate, and microwave on High for 2 additional minutes
